div.div: 'I OFTEN ASK MYSELF, AM I TO BLAME FOR THIS?'

div.a: Gang-Raped Indian Woman’s Companion Speaks Out About The Attack

div.div: In an interview on Indian television, the dead woman’s male companion describes the Dec. 16 attack on a bus that left him unconscious and ultimately caused her death.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/110mxyR&via=Digg&text=Gang-Raped Indian Woman’s Companion Speaks Out About The Attack

div.div: Imagine living in a world where visiting the doctor was an experience fraught with danger. Where the drugs you were prescribed may or may not be effective—and may or may not be safe. We might still be living in this world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z7Am9l&via=Digg&text=Profits Over Your Dead Body

div.a: Why We Need To Kill 'Big Data'

div.div: Why have I grown to hate the words “big data”? Because I think the term itself is outdated, and consists of an overly general set of words that don’t reflect what is actually happening now with data.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UsjYE1&via=Digg&text=Why We Need To Kill 'Big Data'

div.a: Is Mussolini Cool Again In Italy?

div.div: It's a bit disturbing that young people are rediscovering a fondness for Mussolini at the same information has emerged indicating that he was far more complicit and supportive of Nazi war crimes than previously understood.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xs1vs3&via=Digg&text=Is Mussolini Cool Again In Italy?

div.a: Leading Environmental Activist’s Confession: I Was Completely Wrong To Oppose GMOs

div.div: His honest assessment of his heretofore poor understanding of the issue continues for almost 5,000 words—and it’s a must-read for anyone who has ever hesitated over conventional produce.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UieZp8&via=Digg&text=Leading Environmental Activist’s Confession: I Was Completely Wrong To Oppose GMOs

div.div: Fifteen years after the release of the movie that made them stars, Matt Damon and Ben Affleck—along with the rest of the cast and crew—reflect in their own words on how a long-shot film by two unknowns became one of Hollywood's biggest success stories.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WeKoDu&via=Digg&text='Good Will Hunting': An Oral History

div.a: Thieves Steal iPads From Microsoft, Leave Everything Else

div.div: Thieves who targeted Microsoft’s Silicon Valley campus over the holiday break walked away with five iPads but apparently didn’t consider any Microsoft products worth stealing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UsTEcG&via=Digg&text=Thieves Steal iPads From Microsoft, Leave Everything Else

div.a: 'Hashtag' Named Word Of The Year By The American Dialect Society

div.div: Every year, the American Dialect Society nominates and then votes on a word of the year, and for 2012 it's "hashtag." It beat out other nominated words like "YOLO," "Fiscal cliff," and "Gangnam style."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13aAjNL&via=Digg&text='Hashtag' Named Word Of The Year By The American Dialect Society

div.a: A Bluefin Tuna Sells For Record $1.76M In Tokyo

div.div: In the year's first auction at Tokyo's sprawling Tsukiji fish market, a 489-pound tuna caught off northeastern Japan sold for nearly three times the previous high set last year.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UptZMO&via=Digg&text=A Bluefin Tuna Sells For Record $1.76M In Tokyo

div.a: How To Look Like You Can Solve A Rubik’s Cube

div.div: By following the steps in his video, you can look like you’re solving a Rubik’s Cube without actually doing so

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UM0Z4D&via=Digg&text=How To Look Like You Can Solve A Rubik’s Cube

div.a: Watch This Crazy Robot Band Rock Out Like Total Machines

div.div: When you think of robot music, your mind probably drifts to something like dubstep, but this robot band rocks out in a far more traditional sense.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WfbUAv&via=Digg&text=Watch This Crazy Robot Band Rock Out Like Total Machines

div.a: The 'Did You Know' Slut-Shamers Of Tumblr

div.div: Teenage girls find a great many things to do on Tumblr, but one of the more prominent, and more damaging, uses is slut-shaming each other. How a few little pictures started (and continue) a meme-based tirade against women and girls.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ULpf6S&via=Digg&text=The 'Did You Know' Slut-Shamers Of Tumblr

div.div: Gay rights activists have fought for sexual freedom for more than half a century. Asexuals, an estimated one percent of the population, have traditionally kept a low profile. Why should the LGBT community cede a once pejorative, now defining epithet to a group defined by inaction?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10Zz19T&via=Digg&text=Inside The Battle Over Asexuality

div.a: Google May Need History Lesson On Blocking Rivals' Products

div.div: Is there any good reason Google is blocking Windows Phone users from accessing Google Maps via the Internet Explorer browser?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/USOBkk&via=Digg&text=Google May Need History Lesson On Blocking Rivals' Products

div.div: NO WAY TO TREAT YOUR BEST FRIEND

div.a: Some Victorian Era Machines Were Powered By Dogs

div.div: Coal, steam, and human power helped bridge the gap between the machines that kicked off the industrial revolution and the advent of electricity and internal combustion engines, but in some places, man's best friend provided the power that kept machines moving.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SbCH5J&via=Digg&text=Some Victorian Era Machines Were Powered By Dogs

div.div: 'MICE FLEEING THE CITY' NOT CUTTING IT

div.a: Have We Discovered A Foolproof Signal To Predict Earthquakes?

div.div: Seismologists just can't give a simple yes or no answer to the question of whether we're about to have a large earthquake. Could magnetic waves be the trustworthy tool that saves lives?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z4uFZK&via=Digg&text=Have We Discovered A Foolproof Signal To Predict Earthquakes?

div.div: LIVE BY THE MONOPOLY, DIE BY THE MONOPOLY

div.a: Patents May Keep Copyright-Happy Disney From Releasing Its Old Movies In 3D

div.div: There's got to be some amount of irony to see copyright maximalist Disney suddenly running into issues over the possibility that patents might block it from doing something it wants to do.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Wti2WA&via=Digg&text=Patents May Keep Copyright-Happy Disney From Releasing Its Old Movies In 3D

div.a: Cat Used In Brazil Prison Smuggling Attempt

div.div: Guards thought there was something suspicious about a little white cat slipping through a prison gate in Brazil. A prison official says that when they caught the animal, they found a cellphone, drills, small saws and other contraband taped to its body.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TRqznu&via=Digg&text=Cat Used In Brazil Prison Smuggling Attempt

div.a: Look At How Great A Google Smartwatch Could Be

div.div: With wearable tech a bit of a buzzphrase right now and talk of a possible Apple/Intel smartwatch doing the rounds, this concept for what a Google watch might look like is right on cue.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VKumSu&via=Digg&text=Look At How Great A Google Smartwatch Could Be

div.div: CUT AND PASTED FROM ROMNEY'S BINDERS

Calling it a "historic record of who the Democratic women of Congress are," Pelosi today defended the move by her office to alter a photo taken on the steps of the Capitol so that four female lawmakers who were late could be "seen" with their colleagues.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/100DXfq&via=Digg&text=Pelosi Defends Doctored Photo

div.a: Silent Skype Calls Can Hide Secret Messages

div.div: Got a secret message to send? Say it with silence. A new technique can embed secret data during a phone call on Skype.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VqkHBp&via=Digg&text=Silent Skype Calls Can Hide Secret Messages

div.div: NEVER LOSE YOUR CAR IN THE LOT AGAIN

div.a: New Ground-Based Indoor Positioning Tech Is Accurate Down To Just A Few Inches

div.div: Locata's technology goes where GPS can't, delivering a signal one million times stronger than those beamed from satellites.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RvcnCe&via=Digg&text=New Ground-Based Indoor Positioning Tech Is Accurate Down To Just A Few Inches

div.a: The Countries That Won't Let You Name Your Kid Something Ridiculous

div.div: Iceland has one of the stricter naming regimes, but it's not the only country where Apples, Suris, and Blue Ivys would not be tolerated.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RwWhYx&via=Digg&text=The Countries That Won't Let You Name Your Kid Something Ridiculous

div.div: A MOTHERBOARD WALKS INTO A BAR …
What do you get when you cross a fragrance with an actor? Answer: a smell Gibson. Groan away, but you should know that this joke was written by a computer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/134foNr&via=Digg&text=Can Computers Be Funny?

div.a: China's Growing Appetite For New Kinds Of Luxury Goods: Illegal Drugs

div.div: The country's economy has exploded over the past quarter-century. And so has the market for narcotics whose use was once virtually unheard of.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TQB5ve&via=Digg&text=China's Growing Appetite For New Kinds Of Luxury Goods: Illegal Drugs

div.a: Scientists Successfully Reach Temperature Below Absolute Zero

div.div: It may sound less likely than hell freezing over, but physicists have created an atomic gas with a sub-absolute-zero temperature for the first time.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X3FxHK&via=Digg&text=Scientists Successfully Reach Temperature Below Absolute Zero

div.a: Move Over GPS, A New Positioning System Has You In Its Sights

div.div: GPS is now so widespread that we take it for granted. But it's not always perfect—so what if a new technology could achieve more than those triangulated military satellites in the sky?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VmN4QI&via=Digg&text=Move Over GPS, A New Positioning System Has You In Its Sights
